body_html:
@DEKHTIARJonathan Thanks for the contribution. I'm not sure it is necessary to add this API. Constant folding optimizations in TensorFlow will replace expressions like '5 * ones_like(x)' with a the same constant that alpha_as(x, 5) would have produced, if the shape of x can be deduced.

Maybe API reviewers can comment?
body_text:

Maybe API reviewers can comment?
body:
@DEKHTIARJonathan Thanks for the contribution. I'm not sure it is necessary to add this API. Constant folding optimizations in TensorFlow will replace expressions like '5 * ones_like(x)' with a the same constant that alpha_as(x, 5) would have produced, if the shape of x can be deduced.

Maybe API reviewers can comment?
